setupjavax

setup.py¶

The setupjavax provides the extensions for the standard setup.py of the setuptools / distutils.

SYNOPSIS¶

setup.py [OPTIONS] [COMMANDS]

OPTIONS¶

See:

  • setup.py: [setuptools] and [setuppy]

  • extensions by setupjavax: [Global-OPTIONS]

COMMANDS¶

See:

  • setup.py: [setuptools] and [setuppy]

  • extensions by setupjavax: [COMMANDS-with-context-OPTIONS]

DESCRIPTION¶

The call interface ‘setuptools’ with extension by ‘setupjavax’.

SEE ALSO¶

setup.py, setupjavax, [setuptools], [distutils]
